content:
Did the domain expire or something?
I tried to view Jenkins via ci.isa-afp.org instead, but that just redirects to ci.isabelle.systems. Is there another way to see the build server?

Those are really three different questions:

  • the domain (owned by Lars Hupel, supposed to be transferred) is currently in an unclear status.
  • the Jenkins no longer exists (there is a Isabelle-based build server now, generally reachable under build.proof.cit.tum.de).
  • actually, most TUM servers are down currently as the cooling aggregates blew up. We expect a temporary solution to be in effect tomorrow night (but who knows how long that actually takes).
For the record, all of these work again.
